channel.title: Hugo on Kiran Gangadharan
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Kiran Gangadharan

item.title: Revamp and Resume
item.description: It’s been a while since I last wrote anything. I’ve had a few ideas, but I ended up procrastinating and avoiding the work. Recently, I’ve been thinking of doing deliberate practice to improve my writing, and this provided a good enough reason to break out of the procrastination loop and start publishing again. Before writing this post, I revamped my blog by updating the version of Hugo and changing the UI theme.
